reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson explains complex concepts clearly and is always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! His lectures are engaging and he provides practical coding examples.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes goes too fast. Could improve on explaining difficult topics.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and brings historical events to life. Assignments can be challenging.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher! Her classes are thought-provoking and she encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Struggles to explain complex concepts. Often seems unprepared for lectures.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Excellent lab instructor. Lectures can be dry but she's very helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Inspiring professor who brings classic literature to life. Discussions are always engaging.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Exams are very difficult.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenges students to think critically. Sometimes goes off on tangents but overall great.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Fantastic professor who relates course material to real-world issues. Very approachable.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Seems disinterested in teaching. Lectures are poorly organized and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about art and makes the subject interesting. Could improve on providing feedback.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Highly knowledgeable but not great at explaining. Projects are interesting but challenging.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Inspiring teacher who brings real-world experience to the classroom. Fieldwork is excellent.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Skilled musician and good teacher. Sometimes assumes too much prior knowledge.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Brilliant professor who makes language study fascinating. Always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Brings real-world experience but can be disorganized. Group projects are hit or miss.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with interesting fieldwork stories. Assignments can be vague at times.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Struggles to explain concepts clearly. Often seems frustrated with student questions.
